input.sentences: we went to a trip to location last week .
we saw many ancient buildings and monuments .
we discovered this coffee place that really surprised us .
output.sentences: We decided to take a week off for a trip together, at a mutually agreed upon location.
We all like history, ancient and modern, and we lovemaking tours that include monuments and old buildings.
And since we all appreciate interesting  architecture too, we chose  the capital for our trip.
One interesting building we discovered surprised us by being a coffee house with excellent coffee.
Later, we found another quaint restaurant for a delicious dinnedinnerr.
